DOC.brief_title: Evaluate PF-00547659 On Cerebrospinal Fluid Lymphocytes In Volunteers With Crohn 's Disease Or Ulcerative Colitis Who Failed Or Did Not Tolerate Anti-TNFs
DOC.criteria: male female > =18 = < 75 year For CD subject : hsCRP > 5 mg/L HarveyBradshaw Index > 8 OR HBI determine ( ie stoma present ) hsCRP < 5mg/L : active lesion colonoscopy flexible sigmoidoscopy active Crohn 's disease CT MR enterography For UC subject : diagnosis UC > 3 month ; must endoscopy confirm active disease screening ; total mayo score 6 12 point moderate severe disease endoscopy Pregnancy breastfeed TB active enteric infection Entero vesicular fistula Prior use natalizumab vedolizumab Right leave heart failure include symptomatic diastolic dysfunction unexplained elevation troponin I ( > 0.05 ng/mL )
DOC.keyword: Crohn 's disease lumbar puncture anti-MAdCAM monoclonal antibody PF-00547659 Ulcerative Colitis
